message: Good day Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its value and value it will bring to you, I'm sure you'll find our asking price of $1400000 quite reasonable.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product, but considering my current budget and market conditions, I can proceed only if I can secure it for $1000000. Please let me know if we can work with this price.

Hi Bob, after reevaluating our position and considering your feedback, we're willing to lower our asking price to $1100000. We believe this adjustment demonstrates our commitment to reaching an agreement that benefits both parties. Please review this new offer, and I look forward to hearing your response.

Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your effort to meet me halfway. However, considering my budget constraints and market conditions, I can proceed only if we can settle at $1050000. Please let me know if this works for you.

Alice, thank you for your continued flexibility. Considering my budget constraints and the options available, I'm prepared to purchase immediately if we can agree on $1025000. I believe this offer reflects a fair compromise given the current market conditions. Please let me know if you can accept this price.
